column4: anyone know how to disable a touchpad on a laptop if a mouse plugged in ?
because  i have a 3lb laptop   super small  and i always hit the pad and relocate the cursor
the laptop has an on off switch for it  if windows is running
or     how i turn off taps ?
In Windows I have software for that, as well. No idea for Linux
argh    i got tpconfig  but it tells me no synaptics touchpad    rofl    thats what it is
solved the typing issue for me
it was a line need to be added to the device script
